1.「リウ老師……。| そなたは いったい どこにいるのじゃ……。: Master Liu... where in the world are you?

4.「ポツコン３号？ よく わからぬが……| おぬし 今 余を 役立たずと申したな！: Junkey #3? I don't know... but you just called|me useless! How rude! In this day and age,|it'd be your head saying something like that!

5.「このような時代に 来ることがなければ| 余は 今ごろ たいそうな技術を| リウ: Had it not been for the coming of these times,|I would have by now been taught a great deal|of skill by Master Liu!

7.「あのときの約束さえ 果たされていたら……: If only that promise had been fulfilled.

11.「火山を調査している 学者さんの話によると| 魔物の大群が 火山に押し寄せて|:
The scientists who are investigating the|volcano say that hordes of monsters have been|pouring into the volcano and performing some|
|sort of ritual!

13.「え……。な…なに この子……？| お父さん また 子供を拾ってきたの？: What... what is she...? Father, did you pick|up another child?

14.「今の話は 本当よ。| 私も 遠巻きにだけど 鳥っぽい魔物が| 火口付近に集まっ: What you just said is true. I saw a bird-like|monster gathering near the crater from a|distance with my own eyes.

15.「<pc>よ 聞いたかえ！？| グルヤンラシュじゃ！| ついに きゃつが 動きだ: <pc>, did you hear that? Guryan Rush!|At last, the cat's out of the bag!

16.「グ…グルヤン……？ 何 それ？: G... g... gul yan...? What's that?

17.「くわしく 説明している時間はない！| カルサドラ火山こそ きゃつの新たな根城じ: I don't have time to go into detail! Calsadora|Volcano is the new stronghold of the kyats!|It's obvious they're hatching a plot there!

18.「あなたの言っていることは| よく わからないけど……。| 不吉な予感がするのは: I don't know what you're talking about but it|sure sounds ominous.

19.「だから すぐにでも 火口付近に行って| あやしい儀式を 止めたいんだけど……。: So I'd like to go to the crater right away and|stop the weird ritual, but... unless I can|fly, I can't go there.

20.「ねえ！ <pc> お願い！| カルサドラ火山の 火口付近に行く方法を| 私と: Hey! <pc> Please! Would you please|join me in finding a way to get near the|crater of Calsadora Volcano?<yesno><close>

21.「そう言わずに お願いよ！| 私 ひとりでは 間に合わないかもしれないわ！| す: Don't say that. Please! I might not be able to|make it on my own! There are already quite a|few monsters here!

22.「ありがとう <pc>！| 外から 火口付近に行くのは ムリみたいだから| 火山:
Thank you ! Well, it looks like|we can't get to the crater from the outside,|so let's see if we can't get to it from inside|
|the volcano!

23.「溶岩の流れる洞くつを 進むことになるけど| ほかに方法が 思いつかないわ！|: We're going to have to go through a cave with|flowing lava, and I don't know how else to get|there! Well, I'll just go ahead!

25.「溶岩の流れる洞くつを行くなど みすみす| 死ににいくようなものじゃ。そなたのよ: To walk through a cave of flowing lava is like|walking into death. Why would a sweet maiden|like you risk it all?

|ceremonies.
